config.smartFlatten.description: Automatically flatten single top-level folder with same name as archive to avoid redundant nested folders.
config.preview.enabled.description: Enable archive preview. When disabled, archives will not open in the preview editor.
config.preview.filePreviewEnabled.descri: Enable file preview from within archives. When disabled, clicking on files in the archive preview will not open them.
config.preview.maxArchiveSizeMB.descript: Maximum archive size in megabytes (MB) that can be previewed. Archives larger than this will show a confirmation dialog.
config.preview.maxFileSizeMB.description: Maximum file size in megabytes (MB) that can be opened from an archive. Files larger than this will show a confirmation dialog.
